scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn test && yarn run build:fast
scripts.package:prod:darwin: cross-var "electron-packager . \"Business Modeler Preview\" --out=out --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite --icon=./build/icon.icns --ignore=\"^/node_modules|^/out|^/src|^/static|^/LICENSE|^/tsconfig.json|^/webpack.config.js|^/yarn-error.log\" && (cd out && zip -ry \"Business Modeler Preview-darwin-x64.zip\" \"Business Modeler Preview-darwin-x64\")"
scripts.package:prod:all: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:linux && yarn run package:prod:darwin && yarn run package:prod:win32
scripts.build:prod:linux: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:linux
scripts.build:prod:darwin: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:darwin
scripts.build:prod:win32: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:win32
scripts.build:prod:all: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:linux && yarn run package:prod:darwin && yarn run package:prod:win32
